message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.SE, cs.CY, cs.DC 

The paper discusses authentication methods for pervasive computing, which involves the security and privacy of data and communication. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also discusses the identification of key characteristics of each pervasive application scenario, which suggests that it may also belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.SE (Software Engineering). Additionally, the paper discusses the challenges of providing authentication for heterogeneous devices, which may fall under cs.CY (Computers and Society) and cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing).
